Play in moderation, once you lose a winning streak, or have survivors t-bag you at the exit gate knowing there is nothing you can do to stop them from escaping, you genuinely feel sad. I lost all survivors twice in a row and I wasn't even mad, literally just depressed.

What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little bitch? I'll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Navy Seals, and I've been involved in numerous secret raids on Al-Quaeda, and I have over 300 confirmed kills. I am trained in gorilla warfare and I'm the top sniper in the entire US armed forces. You are nothing to me but just another target. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the Internet? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You're fucking dead, kid. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways, and that's just with my bare hands. Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the United States Marine Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little "clever" comment was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn't, you didn't, and now you're paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it. You're fucking dead, kiddo.

Dead By Daylight is a mediocre game with a ton of potential, unfortunately, it appears that the developers behind the game are either not up to the task of ever realizing that potential or more interested in cranking out overpriced DLC and cosmetics
Reminds me of the slasher movies!
Jogo Ã© bom, tem muito potencial ainda! E mesmo as vezes eu passando raiva com esse jogo, eu conheci pessoas fantasticas nele<3

For those who want to join this game, please don't. Everyone in this game doesn't care about player manners in the game. If you are the last player standing, you will be toy by the killer. If you want to report this, then bad luck because the game players in forum say they don't care, and the dev doesn't do anything about it. Also the queueing time is so long, seems like not much player left here. So do yourself a favor and don't buy this game.

Shit game
still love it tho
This is a great game if your looking for an online multiplayer survival game. Team up as a survivor to repair generators and escape, or become the killer and sacrifice all the survivors.

Long loading times, boring looping gameplay, terrible updates, shitty framerate, horrible matchmaking, lackluster updates, laggy servers, buggy mechanics. This game feels like it never made it out of beta. It's insane how they've made crossovers with other franchises when this game so tedious to play now. Looping at killer shack and having no gens pop makes me want to actually be this game's namesake. Getting downed and being exhausted on the ground? Ha! Loading into a map and having my hex spawn right next to everyone. Fucky unhook hitboxes, and actually bad maps. Don't buy this game or its DLC until the devs get their shit together.

Ta bueno el juego

this review is after 24 hours of playtime. made around the time the resident evil chapter released

this game is fun, theres alot of content. i mean alot! if you dont mind spending money on the dlc chapters for extra survivors and killers, you have ALOT of stuff to do. I havent gotten everything yet but i got a few things and its great. This is a blast with friends. Running custom games, playing Survive with Friends, its great. You still can run solo as well. I dont drag reviews to long, if you have friends, and they also own it, Buy it, this game excels with friends.

Muy recomendado para jugar con amigos. 
Si jugas de killer te lo dejan muy facilito, los agarras con el oni y les machucas el pito.
Si jugas de survi solito, no seas hijo de puta y ayuda a tus cumpas, mÃ¡s si tu compa es re pro loopeando reparate unos gens.
Hoy en dia los killers son re trolos y se desconectan cuando los loopeas mas de 20 segundos.
It's Dead By Daylight. Resident Evil is a chapter DLC in this game so that's excellent.
i only recommend this game if you play killer, or if you don't play survivor, or also if you don't play killer either. i also recommend not playing as a spectator either.
